description.lang: Transform any home into a smart home with the Jasco In-Wall Smart Dimmer. The In-Wall Smart Dimmer can easily replace any standard in-wall switch and remotely controls a light in your home. Your home will be equipped with ultimate flexibility with the Jasco Z-Wave Smart Dimmer, capable of being used by itself or with up to four add-on switches. Screw terminal installation provides improved space efficiency when replacing existing switches and the integrated LED indicator light allows you to easily locate the switch in a dark room. The Jasco Z-Wave In-Wall Smart Dimmer is compatible with any Z-Wave certified gateway, providing access to many popular home automation systems. Take control of your home lighting with Jasco Z-Wave Smart Lighting Controls!
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, Multilevel Switch Report
Support Basic Set and is controlled with the local load
Supports Basic Set and is controlled by double pressing the On or Off button

Dime Rate Adjustments when receiving an All-On or All-Off command
timing of steps

When shipped from the factory, the LED is set to turn ON when the connected light is turned OFF. This is the default setting and can be changed if your primary controller supports the node configuration function. To make the LED turn ON when the light is turned ON, change parameter 3s value to 1. To turn the LED OFF at all times, change parameter 3s value to 2.
LED ON when load is ON
LED always OFF
Default
If the switch is accidentally installed upside down with On at the bottom and Off at the top, the default On/Off rocker settings can be reversed by changing parameter 4s value to 1.
Default
Invert Switch
